name: Seduction 誘惑
description: Succubus are imprisoned in old dungeon, rescue them by finding ancient magic gems to form a key to their cages. They will show gratitude for sure... Feel like their master. They do everything you want. Give them a command and have fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent) Storage: 3800 MB available space
